publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2364# Linda Fabiani: Civilian Peace Service—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment of funds for international development; recognises that discussions are ongoing with aid agencies in Scotland with regard to these funds; recognises that European funding is available for peacemaking and conflict resolution functions, and expresses support for the work of the Scottish Network for a Civilian Peace Service towards the establishment of a civilian peace service with a key role in conflict prevention and resolution and post-conflict peace-building. R Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-2364 # Linda Fabiani: Civilian Peace Service—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment of funds for international development; recognises that discussions are ongoing with aid agencies in Scotland with regard to these funds; recognises that European funding is available for peacemaking and conflict resolution functions, and expresses support for the work of the Scottish Network for a Civilian Peace Service towards the establishment of a civilian peace service with a key role in conflict prevention and resolution and post-conflict peace-building. R Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
